yaak.agent.behavior
Interface ActorBehavior

All Superinterfaces:
AgentBehavior
public interface ActorBehavior
extends AgentBehavior

ActorBehavior prescribes a simple contract for executing arbitrary operations.

Version:

Methods inherited from interface yaak.agent.behavior.AgentBehavior
execute
 

Method Detail

execute

public java.lang.Object execute(Actor actor)

Executes a custom sense-reason-act execution cycle (protocol). The Actor's sense(), reason(), and act() methods should implements the sense-reason-act process under the control of this execution protocol.

Parameters:
actor - The actor associated with this behavior object.
Returns:
Any application-specific object produced (returned) by the actor's act() method.
